ygData.subject: I dont know why u play a wizard, but...
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know why you guys play a Wizard, but I know why I do, thats the fascinationg with spells, the sheer ability to shoot  with so much dmg per shot, i like
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know why you guys play a Wizard, but I know why I do, thats the
fascinationg with spells, the sheer ability to shoot with so much dmg
per shot, i like that. In UO, i had alot of magery, i liked there spells
better than the Wizard in here cuz they could do all sorts of fun stuff,
like conjure 2 animals and make them fight(great fun with eles :P) and
all kinds of stuff. But I like a wizard, and I for one think they are
just fine. If you got a problem with a wizard, I think you should play
another class, not whine about it.

P.S. the /feedback helps ALOT! I also want to say that everyone here
should spend some special time to talk to guides if you see em around.
They give up there EQ playing time to help others, and thats GREAT! I
personally talk to each of em for about 5 min or more every time I see
em, I even get along pretty well and kinda know this guide on The Rathe
server :)
-Malvos, my 2pp 3gp 1sp and 9cp!
